entry.title: Monday night: Chance of light snow. Low minus 24. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of light snow this evening and after midnight. Clearing before morning. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low minus 24. Wind chill minus 20 this evening and minus 32 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Monday 02 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Mainly sunny. High minus 21.
